AdsBrandStoresApiContractScopeHeader.description: The identifier of a profile associated with the advertiser account. Use GET method on Profiles resource to list profiles associated with the access token passed in the HTTP Authorization header and choose profile id profileId from the response to pass it as input.
AdsBrandStoresApiContractScopeHeader.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-Scope

scopes.advertising::audiences: Grants access to data provider APIs
scopes.advertising::campaign_management: Grants write access to campaign management.
scopes.advertising::test:create_account: Grants write access to create test accounts functionality
scopes.cpc_advertising:campaign_management: Grants write access to campaign management. Legacy name (no difference from advertising::campaign_management)

info.title: Amazon Ads API - Brand Stores management (beta)

post.description:
A search read, allowing use of more complex filters.

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["amazon_stores_edit","amazon_stores_view"]

A search read, allowing use of more complex filters.

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["amazon_stores_edit","amazon_stores_view"]

Updates BrandStoreEditionPublishVersions. Behaves as PATCH unless otherwise stated.

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["amazon_stores_edit"]

Updates BrandStorePages. Behaves as PATCH unless otherwise stated.
